name: Agent Photoshoot
description:
THE IN-BROWSER DOESN'T FULLY WORK, DOWNLOAD FOR COMPLETED GAME! (bug is even if you shoot the target it wont end the level.)

Play as a hitman, but instead of killing targets, you "shoot" them.

Made for the second Mashup Game Jam.

Theme : Unconventional Means

- How to play -

Use WASD - Arrow Keys to move, mouse to aim, left click to shoot, right click to zoom. WIth zoom you have larger range.

The point of the game is to "shoot" the target shown in the top right corner. Your camera has a range. 

- Notes -

I'm finally done, I'm not the most proud of the game because theres only small amount of levels, didnt even put a tutorial, but i don't think its the worst. But it was very fun and tought me a lot so it was worth it.
